chart_metadata.name: elastic-search
chart_metadata.description: Elasticsearch is the distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine at the heart of the Elastic Stack.

runAsContext.description: Elastic Search runs as non-root user.

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Elastic Search

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password for the Elastic Search (elastic) user.

attrs.label: Node Name
attrs.description: The name of the Elastic Search node.

attrs.label: Heap Size
attrs.description: The heap size for Elastic Search.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Elastic Search.

attrs.label: HTTP Port
attrs.description: The port for the Elastic Search HTTP

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: Certificate
attrs.description: The certificate to use for Elastic Search </br>

attrs.label: Elastic Search Data Storage
attrs.description: The path to store Elastic Search data.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the dataset.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: Path
attrs.description: Path to perform ACL

attrs.label: ACL Entries
attrs.description: ACL Entries

attrs.label: ID
attrs.description: Make sure to check the ID value is correct and aligns with RunAs user context of the application

attrs.description: Enable ACL for the dataset.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: Host Path to perform ACL

attrs.label: ACL Entries
attrs.description: ACL Entries

attrs.label: ID
attrs.description: Make sure to check the ID value is correct and aligns with RunAs user context of the application

attrs.label: Force Flag
attrs.description: Enabling `Force` applies ACL even if the path has existing data

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: Additional Storage
attrs.description: Additional storage for Elastic Search.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to a persistent volume claim.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB Share (Mounts a persistent volume claim to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Read Only
attrs.description: Mount the volume as read only.

attrs.label: Mount Path
attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.description: Enable ACL for the dataset.

attrs.description: Make sure to check the ID value is correct and aligns with RunAs user context of the application

attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.description: Enable ACL for the dataset.

attrs.label: SMB Share Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the SMB Share.

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: The server for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Share
attrs.description: The share name for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Domain (Optional)
attrs.description: The domain for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: The username for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Size (in Gi)
attrs.description: The size of the volume quota.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Elastic Search.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Elastic Search.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

1.1.18.app_readme:
Elastic Search

If you want to apply additional configuration you can by using additional environment variables.

See the Elastic Search documentation for more information.
1.1.18.detailed_readme:
Elastic Search

If you want to apply additional configuration you can by using additional environment variables.

See the Elastic Search documentation for more information.
